flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36.0>>36.0 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36.0=$<<120+36.0=161.0>>161.0
So he makes 161.0*25=$<<161.0*25=4025.0>>4025.0 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 4025.0*4=$<<4025.0*4=16100.0>>16100.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156.0, not 161.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
